tier.item: (60) Tokyo-no biru-no okuzyoo kara mita
-Gen building-Gentop from (I) saw
Haree-suisei-wa smog-no tame bonyariot
Halley's Comet-Top smog-Gen due.to faintly
nigotte ita ga, Okinawa-no Naha-de mita
blurred was but Gen -in (I) saw
sore-wa yozora-ni kukkirito kagayaite-ita.
it-Top night.sky-in vividly shining was.
`Halley's Comet that (I) saw from the top of a building in Tokyo was blurred by
the smog, but it that (I) saw in Naha City in Okinawa was vividly shining in the
night sky.'

it-Top night.sky-in vividly shining was.

the smog, but it that (I) saw in Naha City in Okinawa was vividly shining in the
night sky.'
Tokyo-no biru-no okuzyoo kara mita Haree-suisei-wa smog-no tame bonyariot nigotte ita ga, Okinawa-no Naha-de mita sore-wa yozora-ni kukkirito kagayaite-ita.
-Gen building-Gentop from (I) saw Halley's Comet-Top smog-Gen due.to faintly blurred was but Gen-in (I) saw it-Top night.sky-in vividly shining was.
Halley's Comet that (I) saw from the top of a building in Tokyo was blurred by the smog, but it that (I) saw in Naha City in Okinawa was vividly shining in the night sky.
